PlayerController - Class in it.polimi.se2019.controller
This class controls player actions, it contains the player's current state which is determined by the amount of damage received or the state of the game (regular turns or final frenzy round).

playFrenzyTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.controller.GameBoardController
This method manages the final frenzy round which is played when the number of skulls on the scoreboard reaches 0 after this final round the scoreboard will be resolved and the game will end
playTurn(Integer) - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.controller.PlayerController
Take turn
playTurns() - Method in class it.polimi.se2019.controller.GameBoardController
This method is the main game loop, it makes players do actions on their turn, replaces resources that have been picked up during a turn and resolves player deaths.
